text: The 1909 Argentine Primera División was the 18th season of top-flight football in Argentina. The season began on May 2 and ended on November 21.Argentina 1901 by Osvaldo Gorgazzi at RSSSF.com The championship featured 10 teams, with each team playing the other twice. Alumni won the championship, achieving its 8th title in 10 seasons. River Plate made its debuts at the top division while Lomas and Reformer were relegated, being the first teams in the history of Primera División to be relegated under the new system. ==Final table== ==References== Category:Argentine Primera División seasons Category:1909 in Argentine football Category:1909 in South American football
title: 1909 Argentine Primera División
